t: Amazon is planning to open its first fashion storefront — here's what it'll look like
s: February 19, 2022 - Last month, the e-commerce giant announced plans to launch a 30,000-square-foot brick-and-mortar fashion storefront called Amazon Style sometime in 2022. It'll be located in The Americana at Brand mall in Los Angeles next to traditional retail brands like Nordstrom, J.
